svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of GDP spent on education vs. Share of expenditure assigned to
Government expenditure on education as a share of GDP (X-axis), against government expenditure on education as a share of
total government expenditure (Y-axis). Colors represent different world regions. Observations correspond to 2010 data (or the
Share of Education in Government Expenditure
